toHex

public static java.lang.Appendable toHex(java.lang.Appendable buf,
                                         byte[] ba)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Converts a byte array to a hex-string and write the result to an Appendable (such as a StringBuilder).

Parameters:

Returns:
always returns buf
Throws:
java.io.IOException - upon errors writing to buf
